org.pragmaticminds.crunch.api.windowed.extractor

Class GroupByExtractor<T extends Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pragmaticminds.crunch.api.windowed.extractor.GroupByExtractor<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, WindowExtractor<T>

    public class GroupByExtractor<T extends Serializable>
extends Object
implements WindowExtractor<T>
    This class implements WindowExtractor. It has aggregators which are holding values of all last values, where the window flag in the WindowedEvaluationFunction was open. The Aggregations accumulate specific values like sums etc. All aggregated values are passed optionally to a GroupAggregationFinalizer, which creates the resulting GenericEvents. Is the GroupAggregationFinalizer not set all aggregated values are put into an resulting GenericEvent.
    Author:
    Erwin Wagasow Created by Erwin Wagasow on 16.08.2018
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public void apply(MRecord record)
        This method collects single values for the later made extraction. The value is passed to each Supplier and the result to the Aggregation.
        Specified by:
        apply in interface WindowExtractor<T extends Serializable>
        Parameters:
        record - from the eval call of the WindowedEvaluationFunction.

      • finish

        public void finish(EvaluationContext<T> context)
        Generates resulting GenericEvents from the applied MRecords and calls the contexts collect method on the results.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
